name: Soccer Crazy - Funny 2 players Physics Game
name_original: Soccer Crazy - Funny 2 players Physics Game
description:
Soccer Crazy Physics is one of the best football game with amazing physics, funny players.

- Fun bouncy ball such as football ball, basketball ball, rugby ball, tennis ball.
- Multiscreen of day, night...
- You can play on left or right of the screen.
- Especially, you can free select any soccer team to play such as Brazil, Germany, Spain, Barcelona, Holland, France, Argentina.
- Very easy to play, you just tap and tap on screen, get 6 goals to win.
- You can play with friend by selecting 2 players mode, 2 players play on one screen.
- With 8 bit pixel graphic, you'll get back to childhood.
- With funny physics, you'll laugh out loud ^^
- Just for fun, NO in-app purchase item, you no need watch video for selecting team.

Like and comment our Facebook fan page if you want to add more teams:
https://www.facebook.com/GNIK.chanel

Enjoy right now.
